titleStmt.title: Observations concerning the present state of religion in the Romish Church, with some reflections upon them made in a journey through some provinces of Germany, in the year 1698 : as also an account of what seemed most remarkable in those countries / by Theophilus Dorrington ...
titleStmt.author: Dorrington, Theophilus, d. 1715.

notesStmt.note: Half title: An account of a journey through some provinces of Germany, in the year 1698.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
